resources.string: This application lets your friends to send \"silent\" SMSes to you. They would just start a message with \"#s\" to make your phone to receive _this_ SMS in the silent mode or with \"#v\" to use vibration only.
\"#v Dude, are you sleeping? Call me\" \n\"#s Good night, dear :-*\"
To stop handling tags in SMS press \"Halt handling\" button
Now tags handling is off. To resume press \"Resume handling\" button
Now your phone receives SMS-es with the #v tag in vibration mode

This app listens for incoming SMS-es and looks for #v tag inside. If it finds, this SMS is taken in the vibro mode 
A couple of application examples:
 1) If you doubt if your girlfriend is sleeping at the moment you can send "vibro" SMS without misgiving to wake her up. 
 2) You can send it to your colleague on a conference without risk of awkward situation.
